title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions: Get ready for high-speed superhero fun with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! This set includes five awesome vehicles - Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz - all made of durable Batcast Metal diecast. These cars are designed with working wheels for realistic play and are compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately). Recommended for ages 3 and up, these vehicles encourage imaginative play and storytelling. Let the Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action begin with this exciting toy car set!
